channel.title: Posts on STA304 A1 DD
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on STA304 A1 DD

item.title: A Plain Markdown Post
item.description: This is a post written in plain Markdown (*.md) instead of R Markdown (*.Rmd). The major differences are: You cannot run any R code in a plain Markdown document, whereas in an R Markdown document, you can embed R code chunks (```{r}); A plain Markdown post is rendered through Blackfriday, and an R Markdown document is compiled by rmarkdown and Pandoc. There are many differences in syntax between Blackfriday’s Markdown and Pandoc’s Markdown.

item.title: Exploring Opinions Towards Social Conflicts Using CES2000
item.description: We use R(R Core Team 2020) and R package tidyverse (Wickham et al. 2019) to do the analysis. Code and data supporting this analysis is avaliable at: “https://github.com/dding33/STA304”. Reference R Core Team. 2020. R: A Language and Environment for Statistical Computing. Vienna, Austria: R Foundation for Statistical Computing. https://www.R-project.org/. Wickham, Hadley, Mara Averick, Jennifer Bryan, Winston Chang, Lucy D’Agostino McGowan, Romain François, Garrett Grolemund, et al. 2019. “Welcome to the tidyverse.
